lines.text:
[while having sex with Raoul]
Hurry up, Raoul.
You want me to hurry up, you gotta speed up the tempo. Come on.
Oh, Toni, we'll be here all night at the rate you're going. Let me help.
You should've been there to see the new arrangement. Tell me how we did.
I can count, Z.W. I need someone I can count on.
Come on, you can count on me. You're the best. Don't I always tell you that?
Just keep it up, that's all.
Am I crazy or were things a lot easier when we were broke?
Well, making the mega-bucks doesn't necessarily solve all your problems. Just means you can afford bigger ones.
Z.W.'s. I'll beg him, I'll buy him, I'll fuck him, but I'm getting us out of here.

[about Z.W]
If I had another job and a couple of drinks, I'd get rid of that guy.
